room_title: Escape room "Brain Freeze" by Holmes Escape Games in Houston
review: Me and my friends had a really fun time playing the escape game here. It was our first time and the owners explained every thing very well and were very friendly. We did the Brain freeze game and it was indeed challenging. But we did manage to nail it just in the brink of time with the help of few hints. Overall had a great time and highly recommended!

room_title: Escape room "Brain Freeze" by Holmes Escape Games in Houston
review: We really enjoyed the Brain Freeze room and had a lot of fun with the puzzles throughout it....very challenging, we barely escaped with 44 seconds left on the clock. The owner was really cool and easy going. The establishment was very clean and well maintained. I will definitely go back to do another room.

room_title: Escape room "Brain Freeze" by Holmes Escape Games in Houston
review: Had a great time with family.The staff was helpful and courteous.I would definitely recommend this spot.I look forward to going back again.
